67 /*========== Macros and Definitions =========================================*/
68 
69 /*========== Static Constant and Variable Definitions =======================*/
70 /** local storage of the #DATA_BLOCK_BALANCING_CONTROL_s table */
71 static DATA_BLOCK_BALANCING_CONTROL_s bal_balancing = {.header.uniqueId = DATA_BLOCK_ID_BALANCING_CONTROL};
72 
73 /**
74  * @brief contains the state of the contactor state machine
75  */
76 static BAL_STATE_s bal_state = {
77  .timer = 0,
78  .stateRequest = BAL_STATE_NO_REQUEST,
79  .state = BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED,
80  .substate = BAL_ENTRY,
81  .lastState = BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED,
82  .lastSubstate = 0,
83  .triggerEntry = 0,
84  .errorRequestCounter = 0,
85  .initializationFinished = STD_NOT_OK,
86  .active = false,
87  .balancingThreshold = BAL_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD_mV + BAL_HYSTERESIS_mV,
88  .balancingAllowed = true,
89  .balancingGlobalAllowed = false,
90 };
91 
92 /*========== Extern Constant and Variable Definitions =======================*/
93 
94 /*========== Static Function Prototypes =====================================*/
95 /**
96  * @brief Activates voltage based balancing
97  * @details TODO
98  */
99 static bool BAL_ActivateBalancing(void);
100 
101 /**
102  * @brief Deactivates voltage based balancing
103  * @details The balancing state of all cells in all strings set to inactivate
104  * (that is 0) and the delta charge is set to 0 As. The balancing
105  * enable bit is deactivate (that is 0).
106  */
107 static void BAL_Deactivate(void);
108 
109 /**
110  * @brief State machine subfunction to check if balancing is allowed
111  * @details Checks if balancing is allowed. If it is it transfers in the actual
112  * balancing state.
113  */
114 static void BAL_ProcessStateCheckBalancing(BAL_STATE_REQUEST_e state_request);
115 
116 /**
117  * @brief State machine subfunction to balance the battery cell
118  * @details TODO
119  */
120 static void BAL_ProcessStateBalancing(BAL_STATE_REQUEST_e state_request);
121 
122 /*========== Static Function Implementations ================================*/
123 static bool BAL_ActivateBalancing(void) {
124  bool finished = true;
125  DATA_BLOCK_MIN_MAX_s minMax = {.header.uniqueId = DATA_BLOCK_ID_MIN_MAX};
126  /* Database entry is declared static, to place it in the data segment and not on the stack */
127  static DATA_BLOCK_CELL_VOLTAGE_s cellVoltage = {.header.uniqueId = DATA_BLOCK_ID_CELL_VOLTAGE};
128 
129  DATA_READ_DATA(&cellVoltage, &minMax);
130 
131  for (uint8_t s = 0u; s < BS_NR_OF_STRINGS; s++) {
132  int16_t min = minMax.minimumCellVoltage_mV[s];
133  uint16_t nrBalancedCells = 0u;
134  for (uint8_t c = 0u; c < BS_NR_OF_CELL_BLOCKS_PER_STRING; c++) {
135  if (cellVoltage.cellVoltage_mV[s][c] > (min + bal_state.balancingThreshold)) {
136  bal_balancing.balancingState[s][c] = 1;
137  finished = false;
138  /* set without hysteresis so that we now balance all cells that are below the initial threshold */
139  bal_state.balancingThreshold = BAL_GetBalancingThreshold_mV();
140  bal_state.active = true;
141  bal_balancing.enableBalancing = 1;
142  nrBalancedCells++;
143  } else {
144  bal_balancing.balancingState[s][c] = 0;
145  }
146  }
147  bal_balancing.nrBalancedCells[s] = nrBalancedCells;
148  }
149  DATA_WRITE_DATA(&bal_balancing);
150 
151  return finished;
152 }
153 
154 static void BAL_Deactivate(void) {
155  for (uint8_t s = 0u; s < BS_NR_OF_STRINGS; s++) {
156  for (uint16_t i = 0u; i < BS_NR_OF_CELL_BLOCKS_PER_STRING; i++) {
157  bal_balancing.balancingState[s][i] = 0;
158  bal_balancing.deltaCharge_mAs[s][i] = 0;
159  }
160  bal_balancing.nrBalancedCells[s] = 0u;
161  }
162  bal_balancing.enableBalancing = 0;
163  bal_state.active = false;
164 
165  DATA_WRITE_DATA(&bal_balancing);
166 }
167 
168 static void BAL_ProcessStateCheckBalancing(BAL_STATE_REQUEST_e state_request) {
169  if (state_request == BAL_STATE_NO_BALANCING_REQUEST) {
170  bal_state.balancingAllowed = false;
171  }
172  if (state_request == BAL_STATE_ALLOWBALANCING_REQUEST) {
173  bal_state.balancingAllowed = true;
174  }
175 
176  bal_state.timer = BAL_STATEMACH_SHORTTIME_100ms;
177 
178  if ((bal_state.balancingAllowed == false) || (bal_state.balancingGlobalAllowed == false)) {
179  BAL_Deactivate();
180  bal_state.active = false;
181  } else {
182  if (BMS_GetBatterySystemState() == BMS_AT_REST) {
183  bal_state.state = BAL_STATEMACH_BALANCE;
184  bal_state.substate = BAL_ENTRY;
185  }
186  }
187 }
188 
189 static void BAL_ProcessStateBalancing(BAL_STATE_REQUEST_e state_request) {
190  if (state_request == BAL_STATE_NO_BALANCING_REQUEST) {
191  bal_state.balancingAllowed = false;
192  }
193  if (state_request == BAL_STATE_ALLOWBALANCING_REQUEST) {
194  bal_state.balancingAllowed = true;
195  }
196 
197  if (bal_state.balancingGlobalAllowed == false) {
198  if (bal_state.active == true) {
199  BAL_Deactivate();
200  }
201  bal_state.active = false;
202  bal_state.state = BAL_STATEMACH_CHECK_BALANCING;
203  bal_state.substate = BAL_ENTRY;
204  bal_state.timer = BAL_STATEMACH_SHORTTIME_100ms;
205  return;
206  }
207 
208  if (bal_state.substate == BAL_ENTRY) {
209  if (bal_state.balancingAllowed == false) {
210  if (bal_state.active == true) {
211  BAL_Deactivate();
212  }
213  bal_state.active = false;
214  bal_state.state = BAL_STATEMACH_CHECK_BALANCING;
215  bal_state.substate = BAL_ENTRY;
216  } else {
217  bal_state.substate = BAL_CHECK_LOWEST_VOLTAGE;
218  }
219  bal_state.timer = BAL_STATEMACH_SHORTTIME_100ms;
220  return;
221  } else if (bal_state.substate == BAL_CHECK_LOWEST_VOLTAGE) {
222  bal_state.substate = BAL_CHECK_CURRENT;
223  DATA_BLOCK_MIN_MAX_s checkMinMax = {.header.uniqueId = DATA_BLOCK_ID_MIN_MAX};
224  DATA_READ_DATA(&checkMinMax);
225  /* stop balancing if minimum voltage is below minimum threshold or
226  * maximum cell temperature breached upper temperature limit */
227  for (uint8_t s = 0u; s < BS_NR_OF_STRINGS; s++) {
228  if ((checkMinMax.minimumCellVoltage_mV[s] <= BAL_LOWER_VOLTAGE_LIMIT_mV) ||
229  (checkMinMax.maximumTemperature_ddegC[s] >= BAL_UPPER_TEMPERATURE_LIMIT_ddegC)) {
230  if (bal_state.active == true) {
231  BAL_Deactivate();
232  }
233  bal_state.state = BAL_STATEMACH_CHECK_BALANCING;
234  bal_state.substate = BAL_ENTRY;
235  }
236  }
237  bal_state.timer = BAL_STATEMACH_BALANCINGTIME_100ms;
238  return;
239  } else if (bal_state.substate == BAL_CHECK_CURRENT) {
240  if (BMS_GetBatterySystemState() == BMS_AT_REST) {
241  bal_state.substate = BAL_ACTIVATE_BALANCING;
242  } else {
243  if (bal_state.active == true) {
244  BAL_Deactivate();
245  }
246  bal_state.state = BAL_STATEMACH_CHECK_BALANCING;
247  bal_state.substate = BAL_ENTRY;
248  }
249  bal_state.timer = BAL_STATEMACH_BALANCINGTIME_100ms;
250  return;
251  } else if (bal_state.substate == BAL_ACTIVATE_BALANCING) {
252  if (bal_state.balancingAllowed == false) {
253  if (bal_state.active == true) {
254  BAL_Deactivate();
255  }
256  bal_state.active = false;
257  bal_state.state = BAL_STATEMACH_CHECK_BALANCING;
258  bal_state.substate = BAL_ENTRY;
259  } else {
260  if (BAL_ActivateBalancing() == true) {
261  /* set threshold with hysteresis in order to prevent too early reenabling of balancing */
262  bal_state.balancingThreshold = BAL_GetBalancingThreshold_mV() + BAL_HYSTERESIS_mV;
263  bal_state.state = BAL_STATEMACH_CHECK_BALANCING;
264  bal_state.substate = BAL_ENTRY;
265  } else {
266  bal_state.state = BAL_STATEMACH_BALANCE;
267  bal_state.substate = BAL_ENTRY;
268  }
269  }
270  bal_state.timer = BAL_STATEMACH_BALANCINGTIME_100ms;
271  return;
272  }
273 }
274 
275 /*========== Extern Function Implementations ================================*/
276 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e BAL_GetInitializationState(void) {
277  return bal_state.initializationFinished;
278 }
279 
280 extern BAL_RETURN_TYPE_e BAL_SetStateRequest(BAL_STATE_REQUEST_e stateRequest) {
281  BAL_RETURN_TYPE_e retVal = BAL_OK;
282 
283  OS_EnterTaskCritical();
284  retVal = BAL_CheckStateRequest(&bal_state, stateRequest);
285 
286  if (retVal == BAL_OK) {
287  bal_state.stateRequest = stateRequest;
288  }
289  OS_ExitTaskCritical();
290 
291  return retVal;
292 }
293 
294 extern void BAL_Trigger(void) {
295  BAL_STATE_REQUEST_e stateRequest = BAL_STATE_NO_REQUEST;
296 
297  /* Check re-entrance of function */
298  if (BAL_CheckReEntrance(&bal_state) > 0u) {
299  return;
300  }
301 
302  if (bal_state.timer > 0u) {
303  if ((--bal_state.timer) > 0) {
304  bal_state.triggerEntry--;
305  return; /* handle state machine only if timer has elapsed */
306  }
307  }
308 
309  switch (bal_state.state) {
310  case BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED:
311  BAL_SaveLastStates(&bal_state);
312  stateRequest = BAL_TransferStateRequest(&bal_state);
313  BAL_ProcessStateUninitalized(&bal_state, stateRequest);
314  break;
315  case BAL_STATEMACH_INITIALIZATION:
316  BAL_SaveLastStates(&bal_state);
317  BAL_Init(&bal_balancing);
318  BAL_ProcessStateInitialization(&bal_state);
319  break;
320  case BAL_STATEMACH_INITIALIZED:
321  BAL_SaveLastStates(&bal_state);
322  BAL_ProcessStateInitialized(&bal_state);
323  break;
324  case BAL_STATEMACH_CHECK_BALANCING:
325  BAL_SaveLastStates(&bal_state);
326  stateRequest = BAL_TransferStateRequest(&bal_state);
327  BAL_ProcessStateCheckBalancing(stateRequest);
328  break;
329  case BAL_STATEMACH_BALANCE:
330  BAL_SaveLastStates(&bal_state);
331  /* Check if balancing is still allowed */
332  stateRequest = BAL_TransferStateRequest(&bal_state);
333  BAL_ProcessStateBalancing(stateRequest);
334  break;
335  default:
336  /* invalid state */
337  FAS_ASSERT(FAS_TRAP);
338  break;
339  }
340  bal_state.triggerEntry--;
341 }
